about_the_game:
Get pumped up Haggar-style with the second track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Final Fight - Opening"!

This is the introductory track of Final Fight, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
